abilities.name: Immutable Form.
abilities.description: The marut is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The marut's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence. The marut can innately cast the following spell, requiring no material components.
At will: plane shift (self only)

abilities.name: Legendary Resistance
abilities.description: If the marut fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: The marut has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
